28#ifndef EVSIGNAL_INTERNAL_H_INCLUDED_
29#define EVSIGNAL_INTERNAL_H_INCLUDED_
30
31#ifndef evutil_socket_t
32#include "event2/util.h"
33#endif
34#include <signal.h>
35
36typedef void (*ev_sighandler_t)(int);
37
38/* Data structure for the default signal-handling implementation in signal.c
39 */
40struct evsig_info {
41 /* Event watching ev_signal_pair[1] */
42 struct event ev_signal;
43 /* Socketpair used to send notifications from the signal handler */
44 evutil_socket_t ev_signal_pair[2];
45 /* True iff we've added the ev_signal event yet. */
46 int ev_signal_added;
47 /* Count of the number of signals we're currently watching. */
48 int ev_n_signals_added;
49
50 /* Array of previous signal handler objects before Libevent started
51 * messing with them. Used to restore old signal handlers. */
52#ifdef EVENT__HAVE_SIGACTION
53 struct sigaction **sh_old;
54#else
55 ev_sighandler_t **sh_old;
56#endif
57 /* Size of sh_old. */
58 int sh_old_max;
59};
60int evsig_init_(struct event_base *);
61void evsig_dealloc_(struct event_base *);
62
63void evsig_set_base_(struct event_base *base);
64void evsig_free_globals_(void);
65
66#endif /* EVSIGNAL_INTERNAL_H_INCLUDED_ */
67
